        Iterable<Menu> findByMenuPeriod(Date beginning,
                                Date end)
        finds a list of menus that exist in a specific period (Joao Reis - 1160600)
        Parameters:
        beginning - beginning of established time period
        end - end of established time period
        Returns:
        menus that either have a start date or end date in the established time period
